articles.title: Earth Day: Meet the original eco warriors protecting the planet
articles.description: How the ancient techniques of the world's indigenous people could help to combat climate change.
articles.content:
Image caption
 Ancient knowledge is shared among indigenous communities across the Sahel in Africa
Indigenous people account for less than 5% of the world's population - but they support or protect 80% of the planet's biodiversity.
